meta.article_title: May 12, 2014 - Anyone Can Become Very Good at Something

debutant.nom: Practice a specific shot (e.g., serve, loop)
debutant.description: Focus on developing one aspect of your game until it's very good; watch top players and work with a coach.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Daily practice (20 minutes, 5 days a week)
exercices_complementaires.description: Develop a very good serve in about 80 hours by practicing it daily.

metriques_progression.reps: Develop one aspect of your game until it's very good
